channel.title: My Hugo Portfolio Site
channel.description: Recent content on My Hugo Portfolio Site

item.title: Education
item.description: Academic Program I am currently pursuing my academic studies at Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham , Amritapuri. I am majoring in Computer Science and expected to graduate in 2027. I am dedicated to my studies and passionate about Computer Science. I believe that true learning is a continuous process, and I constantly seek opportunities to expand my knowledge and skills. My academic journey has been marked by my curiosity and commitment to personal and professional growth.

item.title: How I approached task 02
item.description: Introduction In this blog post, I want to share my journey of creating my portfolio website using Hugo and the TailBliss theme and displaying it on github pages. I watched a 10 minute youtube video on how to create a portfolio website and display it on github pages and followed the steps in it. I faced some issues when I tried to modify the content in my website but I was able to resolve it by searching it up.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Me and my interests Hello, this is Shubhangi, a down to earth person with lots of logical thinking, high spirited and always willing to take up challenges and delve deeply to find solutions for complex problems. I am a student and a beginner web developer. I am passionate about learning and exploring new technologies. Here, I’ll share my journey into the world of technology and showcase my progress.
